import React, { Component } from "react"; import { Breadcrumb, BreadcrumbItem, Button, Row, Col, Label } from "reactstrap"; import { Control, LocalForm, Errors } from "react-redux-form"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; const required = val => val && val.length; const maxLength = len => val => !val || val.length <= len; const minLength = len => val => val && val.length >= len; const isNumber = val => !isNaN(Number(val)); const validEmail = val => /^[A-Z0-9._%+-]+@[A-Z0-9.-]+\.[A-Z]{2,4}$/i.test(val); class Contact extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.handleSubmit = this.handleSubmit.bind(this); } handleSubmit(values) { console.log("curren State is" + JSON.stringify(values)); alert("curren State is" + JSON.stringify(values)); } render() { return (

); } } export default Contact;
